criteria: Demonstrates knowledge of basic first aid procedures (e.g., cuts, burns, sprains).
Applies first aid procedures appropriately in simulated scenarios.
Recognizes and responds appropriately to emergency situations.
Demonstrates knowledge of emergency contact information and procedures.
descriptions: No understanding of basic first aid demonstrated.
Minimal understanding; unable to describe any first aid procedures.
Identifies 1-2 first aid procedures with limited accuracy.
Identifies several first aid procedures with reasonable accuracy.
Clearly describes and explains most first aid procedures accurately.
Demonstrates comprehensive knowledge of first aid procedures, explaining them accurately and thoroughly.
Unable to apply any first aid in simulated scenarios.
Attempts application, but actions are incorrect or unsafe.
Applies some first aid steps correctly, but misses key elements.
Applies most first aid steps correctly with minor errors.
Applies first aid correctly and efficiently in most simulated scenarios.
Applies first aid correctly, efficiently, and safely in all simulated scenarios, adapting to changing conditions.
Fails to recognize emergency situations.
Recognizes an emergency but responds inappropriately or ineffectively.
Identifies some emergency situations and initiates a basic response.
Identifies most emergency situations and responds with appropriate actions.
Quickly identifies and responds effectively to emergency situations, prioritizing actions.
Demonstrates excellent judgment in emergency situations, taking decisive and appropriate action while ensuring safety.
No knowledge of emergency contact information or procedures.
Limited knowledge; unable to recall emergency numbers.
Recalls some emergency numbers but not procedures.
Recalls emergency numbers and some basic procedures.
Knows emergency numbers and procedures and can explain when to use them.
Demonstrates thorough knowledge of emergency protocols and can articulate them clearly and concisely.
